data.description: YOU WILL: - Develop and enhance internal engineering tools – build dashboards or web apps for product quality tracking, supplier performance, or packaging validation workflows. - Integrate data systems – connect PLM, ERP, and quality databases into unified reporting tools for engineering and supplier metrics. - Automate manual workflows – create scripts or services to automate document control, test data ingestion, or supplier compliance checks. - Collaborate with product engineer and quality teams – gather requirements and translate them into functional, efficient full-stack applications. - Prototype AI-driven or predictive features – explore machine learning integrations for anomaly detection. YOU ARE: - Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related technical field. - Hands-on experience with full-stack technologies – proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript, React (or Vue), Node.js/Python, and REST or GraphQL APIs. - Familiarity with dat...
